title: Russell's future clearing up - What you missed at the Belgian GP
summary: While Spa's skies kept everyone guessing, some real action was unfolding off-track - from driver market shifts and new power plays at Red Bull to karting obsession and calendar complications. Here's what you may have missed at the Belgian GP weekend

qa_pairs.question: Which team is known for its recent power plays and strategic shifts in the driver market?
What racing event is Spa-Francorchamps most commonly associated with in the Formula 1 calendar?
In addition to F1, what type of racing has seen a resurgence in popularity among drivers during the off-season?
